section.description: For more information, watch the video below.

videos.title: Displaying a Fade Out message on a Grid when a Record is Saved
videos.description: A common pattern in web applications is to display a temporary message (a "fade out" message) to confirm when an event has completed. This video shows how to create a fade out message in a Grid Component when a record is saved.

section.description: To learn how to display a fade out message in a UX Component, see [How to Display a Fade Out Message in a UX Component When a Record is Saved].
